All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, android.widget.Filter.FilterListener, androidx.appcompat.widget.EmojiCompatConfigurationView, androidx.core.view.TintableBackgroundView, androidx.core.widget.TintableCompoundDrawablesView, com.hanggrian.socialview.SocialView
public class SocialAutoCompleteTextView extends androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatMultiAutoCompleteTextView implements com.hanggrian.socialview.SocialView
MultiAutoCompleteTextView with hashtag, mention, and hyperlink support.
